specialRules.Tracking the Troll: when a Good model first enters numbered terrain, Evil models hidden there are deployed not in base contact with Good; those Evil models can't Shoot or Move that turn
specialRules.They're Awake!: On tied Priority Roll, randomly select a numbered terrain piece and deploy Evil models hidden within per Tracking the Troll
specialRules.You Do Not Stand Alone: starting Turn 3, on 4+ Halbarad & 6 Rangers of the North arrive from any table edge; starting turn after that arrival, on 4+ Elladan, Elrohir, & 6 Rangers of the North arrive from any table edge
